CHAT.comment: ABDUS-SHAHID M.S. ALI Petitioner v. FEDERAL BUREAU OF PRISONS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:08 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEAN-CLAUDE ANDRE ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KANNON SHANMUGAM ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEAN-CLAUDE ANDRE ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:08 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
